anthropic_config.system: Create a special $1-2 student sponsorship tier with meaningful benefits that acknowledges their support while respecting their budget.

usage_example.python:
from anthropic import Anthropic

client = Anthropic()

message = client.messages.create(
    model="claude-sonnet-4-20250514",
    max_tokens=4096,
    system="""Create a special $1-2 student sponsorship tier with meaningful benefits that acknowledges their supp...""",
    messages=[
        {"role": "user", "content": "Your message here"}
    ]
)
print(message.content[0].text)
